text: 5.16 Lo 9.18-20, 1 Sml 12.18, 1 Kin 13.6, Sng 34.15, Jon 9.31 Anɨb ak, tap si tap tɨmel gɨpɨm okok, Bɨawl binɨb ne ayɨp penpen agyɨkɨnɨmɨb. Agyɨkɨl, Bɨawl ak chɨnop gɨñɨnɨmuŋ agɨl nop agnɨgɨnɨmɨb. Agnɨgem, ne gek nɨbop suŋ lɨnɨmuŋ. God binɨb suŋtep ne okok kɨli nop agnepal ak, agnepal anɨb ak kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl yek, ne kɨles gɨl gɨñɨnɨgab.
